Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities abstract
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of debt and commercial paper borrowings
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance or sale of equity
excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments for businesses property plant and equipment
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities abstract
Other Investing Activities: cash benefit creating helpful incentives to produce semiconductors c h i p s act
proceeds from sale of productive assets
proceeds from u. s. c h i p s and science act c h i p s act incentives
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire short term investments
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collection of longterm investments
proceeds from sale maturity and collection of shortterm investments
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in pension and postretirement obligations
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities abstract
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on disposition of assets1
increase decrease gainon transferof substitutional pension
investment tax credit used to reduce income taxes payable
cash benefit creating helpful incentives to produce semiconductors c h i p s act used to reduce income taxes payable

proceeds from sale of productive assets and insurance recovery
